episode.title: 陰と陽
Yin and Yang
Yin et Yang
In to You
episode.summary: Mei attempts to explain something very important to Sagiri`s party in the forest. Shion tries to explain how he interacts with the world to Nurugai. A mysterious servant of the Tensen tries to explain why Aza Chobe and Toma shouldn`t escape. Source: Crunchyroll
